name: The Contact
description:
Synopsis




One day, a cryptic message was posted on an online bulletin board.
Opening the mysterious URL revealed location coordinates. Despite sensing a dangerous atmosphere, you decide to venture to the location, thinking it might alleviate boredom.

Gameplay

This game is a walking simulator set in a dimly lit, quiet building. Guided by the phone number and location information from the post, the protagonist pursues the enigmatic "it." With a realistic atmosphere and a subtle sense of dread, players experience the terror of everyday encounters in this horror game.

Streaming Guidelines

Streaming and content creation of this game are permitted, regardless of monetization status.
